title: lckyy11
author: lckyy11
content: Hello everyone, does anyone know bookmakers with a similar design to pin-up, betboom? only in cryptocurrency, I like to bet on special outcomes of this line, there are no such outcomes on other bookmakers, thanks, can anyone help.https://imgur.com/a/1uRNxvW

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: To be honest, I have never even heard of that casino before. What makes their lines so special? Have you compared them to some of the top crypto bookmakers out there? Is there something specific they are lacking?

comments.author: lckyy11
comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on March 03, 2023, 09:03:26 PMTo be honest, I have never even heard of that casino before. What makes their lines so special? Have you compared them to some of the top crypto bookmakers out there? Is there something specific they are lacking?I like the line and painting in them, I'm used to them and I want to find the same only in cryptocurrency.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Never heard of that casino before and oos if you are trying to chill for the casino then you should at least give out enough information and at least a link to the site for us to see what the site is up to and what it has to offer that makes them so special for you to create a thread for them,-But then you should keep us updated since you already brought the attention of members of the forum about the site and how help improve our sports betting life

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: lckyy11 on March 03, 2023, 05:57:54 PMHello everyone, does anyone know bookmakers with a similar design to pin-up, betboom? only in cryptocurrency, I like to bet on special outcomes of this line, there are no such outcomes on other bookmakers, thanks, can anyone help.I have tied to search on the forum but on the forum I could not find out any information about betboom. If you want to see a similar design then you may find out at https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=56.0I have seen this site has a registration number and the domain has been purchased a long ago

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Try to download the image and look it up on Google Lens, I did the same and it has ton of similar designs like this(not exactly what's on the image but the similarities are likely at 60% and up, just try it). Of course, you'll come across some legit and not legit, just research that bookmaker in here and I hope you find some good reviews.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: I think that I've seen the same design from other casinos, yeah, not just one but quite a few number of it. The best way to know is to visit each casino on this section and check out their designs. Since you're already here, you can visit each of them and try to compare if the design is the same as betboom and pin-up. That design isn't unique and that depends who their developers are or the provider that they've been using. So, I guess you'll be able to find similarity on other casinos by just spending your time browsing here.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: lckyy11 on March 03, 2023, 09:10:51 PMQuote from: Stalker22 on March 03, 2023, 09:03:26 PMTo be honest, I have never even heard of that casino before. What makes their lines so special? Have you compared them to some of the top crypto bookmakers out there? Is there something specific they are lacking?I like the line and painting in them, I'm used to them and I want to find the same only in cryptocurrency.^ It seems to look like this gambling casino. bet365.comBut as I heard they did not accept crypto, it is a fiat-based casino. That casino is not familiar on this forum and probably no one can give you what you are looking for. But why are you on the line, the user interface? The most important is reputation.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: You are probably going to end up getting scammed.There a not so many legitimate casinos that are clones of others, but I can assure you that there are a ton of scam clones. I have done a quick search and failed to see any clone. I am not sure what exactly you are looking for. The casino webpage design and graphics or just the type of games in there.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on March 03, 2023, 10:12:49 PMYou are probably going to end up getting scammed.There a not so many legitimate casinos that are clones of others, but I can assure you that there are a ton of scam clones. I have done a quick search and failed to see any clone. I am not sure what exactly you are looking for. The casino webpage design and graphics or just the type of games in there.so far I have gambled, I have never encountered gambling that is similar to what you said.but if you just like good graphics, I think there are lots of casino sites that have good graphics and maybe you will like them too instead of having to look for a clone that is similar to the site you are referring to.anyway, it's true what @logfiles said that you have to be careful with sites that have almost the same graphic design as others or are clones of other casinos, it will end up with you being scammed.so it would be better if you (OP) are looking for a trusted, popular casino rather than having to look for a casino that is similar to what you mean.

An unknown gambling platform, even with the popular ones we were able to see clone and which doesn't have any difference until we see it closer. comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: That pin feature from BetBoom doesn't exist on crypto sportsbooks that i've played but the closest sportsbook that I could suggest is Stake since their live score have an additional feature similar to the pin that would let you put it on top so you can easily multi-task but it's in a form of picture in picture.The overall design of BetBoom's sportsbook reminds me of the other crypto casinos like Betcoin, Fortunejack and Cloudbet but these three don't have the pin you're looking for though.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: lckyy11 on March 03, 2023, 05:57:54 PM pin-up, betboom?To be honest OP, I haven’t about both the bookmakers. So I would suggest you to avoid both the sites completely if you love your hard earned money. For the sake of design if you fall in the trap of these sites, then no one can save you from it and you will end up in making losses. What’s the problem with other reputable site’s design and UI? They have great user friendly design and mostly they are “trusted “. I would suggest you to play there and remove this design hype from your mind. Wishing you best of luck for your gambling career.

comments.body: Quote from: lckyy11 on March 03, 2023, 05:57:54 PMHello everyone, does anyone know bookmakers with a similar design to pin-up, betboom? only in cryptocurrency, I like to bet on special outcomes of this line, there are no such outcomes on other bookmakers, thanks, can anyone help.https://imgur.com/a/1uRNxvWWell, I'm not familiar with that casino, to be honest, I don't notice that here in the crypto space mate.But my attention is focused on sports-related to the ball hehe... But you can choose a lot that you can gamble on here in cryptocurrency, one of which is Duelbits, Stakes, Rollbit, Coinplay, Fortunejack, Trustdice, and others. Try to look around here in the forum

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: Daltonik on March 04, 2023, 06:38:31 AMQuote from: lckyy11 on March 03, 2023, 09:10:51 PMQuote from: Stalker22 on March 03, 2023, 09:03:26 PMTo be honest, I have never even heard of that casino before. What makes their lines so special? Have you compared them to some of the top crypto bookmakers out there? Is there something specific they are lacking?I like the line and painting in them, I'm used to them and I want to find the same only in cryptocurrency.I do not know how trusted those online casinos that you have indicated can be considered, for crypto there is a similar interface in stake, for example, or generally deployed immediately to all the proposed possible outcomes according to the version roobet.com.Why would you be seeking for a clone if you can engage with the original one? It could because you are wanting more, in general, but you are also seeking for risk of losing money from doing so. Take note that clone gambling sites are simply not affiliated with the original and that is an enough reason to be cautious with engaging into such platforms. If you are really into such concept then stick with it than to find an alternative offering the same thing you have liked from the start. Most of the people here are not even familiar with the mentioned platform so what more of its clone.There are many gambling platforms to choose from and for me, they are all offering the same set of games and almost the same promotions. The only thing wherein they differ is how the site itself is being managed as a whole. Keep in mind that it is money you are using to engage with such platforms so you better be careful; sometimes the urge to save will cost you more.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: It seems like the only reason the OP made his post was to lure people to this unknown and possibly fraudulent casino. When I did some research on the casino, I found that there are many negative reviews from previous users. It appears that the owners are Russian, but there is little information available about them. Additionally, the OP is not telling the truth about the casino not accepting cryptocurrencies, as they do. However, I strongly advise against depositing any money with them.
